dcterms:creator: C. E. Shannon
W. Weaver
dcterms:description: The CartPole problem involves controlling a cart that moves along a track, with a pole attached to it that must be kept upright. The task is to manage the cart's position and velocity to maintain the pole's equilibrium.
dcterms:title: CartPole

dcterms:creator: C. E. Shannon
W. Weaver
dcterms:description: The OpenAI Gym CartPole is a specific implementation of the CartPole problem within the OpenAI Gym framework, which provides a standard API for reinforcement learning environments.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Gym CartPole
